summary: This mod basically makes skyrim more challenging, instead of fast traveling where you want to go you walk all the way and have fun.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][i][b]Description[/b][/i]
[/size][b]This mods removes some features from skyrim which make it less challenging and sometimes less realistic. But are sometimes needed. Since i made this now in skyrim instead of cheating,quicksaving and loading after death,and  fast traveling. I now play without cheating and without saving and walk 100 of miles by looking at signs and never at me map, IT'S HEAVEN! like real life!

Features Removed [/b]

[list=1][*]Console[/*]
[*]Map[/*]
[*]Quickload and Quicksave[/*]
[*]Tween menu[/*]
[*]Comapass[/*]
[*]Floating Markers
[/*]
[/list][b]
[size=4]
Recommended mods[/size]
[/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45894/?]Death Alternative
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49472/?]Realistic nights[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18916/?]Lanterns of skyrim[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33393/?]Point the way[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33603/?]Roadsigns Redone[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8078/?]Realistic crime report radius[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57612/?]Better roads and bridges[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34842/?]Autosave manager[/url]




If you have any suggestion feel free to post them!





[size=5][i][b]If you want some feautures by your custom taste add these lines to //Main gameplay in controlmap.txt[/b][/i][/size]
[size=3][b]
Map[/b][/size]
Quick Map            0x32    0xff    0xff        0    0    0        0x908

[size=3][b]Console[/b][/size]
Console            0xff    0xff    0xff        0    0    0        0x10
[size=3][b]
Quickload And Quicksave[/b][/size]
Quicksave            0x3f    0xff    0xff        0    0    0        
Quickload            0x43    0xff    0xff        0    0    0       

[size=3][b]Tween menu[/b][/size]
Tween Menu            0x0f    0xff    0xff        0    0    0        0x908

[size=3][b]For compass [/b][/size]
Change the bShowCompass =0 in Skyrimprefs.ini to bShowCompass =1
author: Vlad
